Sign Out Select Icon Desc // about us This project aims to bridge the gap between high school students' interests and informed decision-making. Through advanced assessments and tailored recommendations, we envision equipping students with the tools and insights necessary to pursue fulfilling academic and career paths. This platform is the result of countless hours of hard work, creativity, and collaboration. We aim to bring value to your life, and we sincerely hope you enjoy exploring what we've built. A heartfelt thank you for your support and trust in our journey. Your encouragement inspires us to keep improving and striving for excellence.
Stay tuned for exciting updates and new features as we continue to grow and evolve!
With gratitude, About Us Project Team Berlian Aji Nur Khairi - Project Lead Marcello Jayekto - Mobile Dev Lead Muhammad Arief Rachman - ML Lead Na’imatul Lu’lu’a - Resource Manager Florencia Yang - Github And Repository Manager M.
